title: TYPO3 Fluid-Form
subtitle: Fluid form is a small TYPO3 extension for creating forms only by using TypoScript. This extension was developed form shipping TYPO3 Themes with pre-configured forms.

meta.description: TYPO3 Fluid-Form - Fluid form is a small TYPO3 extension for creating forms only by using TypoScript. This extension was developed form shipping TYPO3 Themes with pre-configured forms.
meta.abstract: Forms configured only by TypoScript
meta.keywords: TYPO3, extension, Forms
meta.og:title: TYPO3 Fluid-Form
meta.og:description: TYPO3 Fluid-Form - Fluid form is a small TYPO3 extension for creating forms only by using TypoScript. This extension was developed form shipping TYPO3 Themes with pre-configured forms.

features: Output of Ajax forms that are easily configurable via TS
Any fields and field types can be created
The extension includes versioning and is easy to maintain
Various finishers set what should happen after the form is sent - send an email or additional option to write contents to a database or generate a PDF on the fly
Any number of field sets with different field types (date, time, etc.)
Captcha, Mathguard, Honeypot can be used
If data is to be written to a database, an automated scheduler can collect the data and send it
Forms can be linked to any data records (e.g. news) and it is possible to send the webpage address hidden in the form entries
Backend module overview of all mails and requests
